data.message: Implement audit log improvements: integrity chain + query tool: Added two improvements: (1) Integrity chain - each deletion entry now includes prev_hash (hash of previous line, or "genesis" for first) and entry_hash for tamper-evidence. (2) New duro_query_audit_log tool - queries deletions.jsonl with filters (event_type, artifact_id, search_text, since, limit) and optional verify_chain to validate integrity chain. Requires MCP restart to activate.
data.task: Implement audit log improvements: integrity chain + query tool
data.outcome: Added two improvements: (1) Integrity chain - each deletion entry now includes prev_hash (hash of previous line, or "genesis" for first) and entry_hash for tamper-evidence. (2) New duro_query_audit_log tool - queries deletions.jsonl with filters (event_type, artifact_id, search_text, since, limit) and optional verify_chain to validate integrity chain. Requires MCP restart to activate.
